posts.message:
Recordit For Window is Live :)

Some Friends and Members were asking for Recordit For Windows :) Alright Here You Go! http://goo.gl/7NvL9Z (Compatible with Windows 7 and Up)

Alright, So we just released our Full Javascript Stack and it's all Public! :) 

Neon (Ne) is a javascript Class system: http://azendal.github.io/neon/

Borium is a simple library to enqueue jobs and execute them in the background.: http://getborium.com/

Error monitoring for Neon: http://freshout-dev.github.io/lithium/

Metriclient - Flexible event and error reporting server: http://freshout-dev.github.io/metriclient/

flow based programing abstraction: http://freshout-dev.github.io/fluorine/

Colored, Nesting, Multiple logging management.: http://benbeltran.github.io/cobalt/

Hady Ahmed Mohammad Tayseer Emad Elsaid

posts.message:
I just want to share with you a vey nice experience I had in this week. on the weekend I had the pleasure to attend Startup Weekend in Guadalajara, Jalisco, Mexico. the largest Startup weekend in All latin America. I had the pleasure to see Drones, play with them and I've got captured from air :)

Yesterday I was also invited to an Event in #Wizeline and I also saw Drones and this time it wasn't as a toy! it was for Mining, Agriculture and Solar.

Can't Imagine if in the Middle East we start using these drones how much more efficient we can get. and how much money it will save us! 

Just wanted to share with you this experience :)

Have a good day
I'm having a web site launched very soon I need to start thinking about marketing specially social one .. any ideas?
Filament: The world's first app store for websites http://filament.io

السلام عليكم ,,,
هو اناا ناو بفاضل بين ان اتعلم LINQ او ADO.net
و طبعاا استقرت ع LINQ بأعتبار انهاا الآحدث 
بس هل هحتاج اتعلم ADO في مرحلة بعد كده 
ولا ان شاء الله LINQ هتغنني عن ADO
ياااريت اسمع نصايحكم و جزاكم الله خيراا
